name: web-journey-recorder-pro
description: Chrome Extension for recording user journeys with Gemini AI

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && esbuild src/index.tsx src/service-worker.js src/content-script.js options.js --bundle --outdir=dist --format=esm --loader:.tsx=tsx --loader:.js=js --minify --entry-names=[name] && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); ['manifest.json', 'index.html', 'options.html', 'index.css'].forEach(f => fs.copyFileSync(f, path.join('dist', f))); fs.mkdirSync(path.join('dist', 'lib'), { recursive: true }); fs.readdirSync('lib').forEach(f => fs.copyFileSync(path.join('lib', f), path.join('dist', 'lib', f)));"
